```{r}
par(pty="s")
```

```{r}
short_city_names = c("Bellingham", "Seattle", "Portland", "Van. Ca", "Van. Wa", "Spokane")
short_distances <- matrix(c(0,127,361,75,347,394,127,0,234, 193, 220, 367, 361, 234, 0, 416,12,465,75,193,416,0,404,455,347,220,12,404,0,458,394,367,465,455,458,0),nrow=6, ncol=6, dimnames = list(short_city_names, short_city_names))
short_distances
```
```{r}
long_city_names = c("Seattle", "LA", "SF", "London", "Paris", "Tokyo", "CT")
long_distances <- matrix(c(0,1545,1092,7700,8041, 7689, 16424, 1545, 0,559,8756, 9085,8806,16050,1092,559,0,8616,8952,8262,16485,7700,8756,8616,0,342,9566,9669,8041,9085,8952,342,0,9719,9341,7689,8806,8262,9566,9719,0,14741,16424,16050,16485,9669,9341,14741,0), nrow = 7, ncol=7, dimnames=list(long_city_names, long_city_names))
long_distances

```

```{r}
par(pty="s")
short_mds = cmdscale(short_distances, k=3)
plot(short_mds, xlim=c(-200,300), ylim=c(-200, 300), xlab="X", ylab="Y")
title(main="Short City MDS 3D")
text(short_mds, label=short_city_names, pos=1)
short_mds
```


```{r}
eigen_values = eigen(short_distances, TRUE)$values
plot(eigen_values, ylab="Eigen Values")
title(main="Eigenvalues of Short Distance Matrix")
```

```{r}
par(pty="s")
list_of_distances = short_distances[lower.tri(short_distances, diag=FALSE)]
plot(list_of_distances, dist(short_mds), xlim=c(0,500), ylim=c(0,500), xlab="Original Distances", ylab="MDS Distances 3D")
title(main="MDS Distance 3D vs. Original Distance")
short_distances
dist(short_mds)
```


```{r}
hist(list_of_distances)
hist(short_distances)

```


```{r}
par(pty="s")
long_mds = cmdscale(long_distances, k=1)
long_mds
plot(long_mds, xlim=c(-7000, 11000),ylim=c(-7000, 11000), xlab="X", ylab='Y')
text(long_mds, label=long_city_names, pos=1)
title(main="Long City MDS 2D")
```
```{r}
eigen_valuesl = eigen(long_distances, TRUE)$values
plot(eigen_valuesl)
```
```{r}
par(pty="s")
list_of_distancesl = long_distances[lower.tri(long_distances, diag=FALSE)]
list_of_distancesl
plot(list_of_distancesl, dist(long_mds), xlim=c(0,17000), ylim=c(0,17000), xlab="Original Distances", ylab="MDS Distance")
title(main="MDS Distance 3D vs. Original Distance")

```
```{r}
c2 <- rgb(255,0,203, max = 255, alpha = 80, names = "lt.pink")
c1 <- rgb(0,216,230,max = 255, alpha = 80, names = "lt.blue")
ori <- hist(list_of_distancesl, col=c2, main="Frequency of distance in MDS 1D model (Blue) and Original Distances (Pink)")
ch <- hist(dist(long_mds), col=c1)
plot(ori,col=c2)
plot(ch, add=TRUE, col=c1)

```




```{r}
cmdscale(short_distances, eig=TRUE,k=1)$GOF
cmdscale(long_distances, eig=TRUE,k=1)$GOF
cmdscale(short_distances, eig=TRUE)$GOF
cmdscale(long_distances, eig=TRUE)$GOF
cmdscale(short_distances,eig=TRUE,k=3)$GOF
cmdscale(long_distances, k=3, eig=TRUE)$GOF
```
